name: Introduction to Emberfall
description: Begin your journey in the world of Emberfall. Learn the basics of navigation, interaction, and choice-making as you explore the ancient ruins and mystical landscapes.

start.title: Adventurerâ€™s Guild Registration
start.description: You step up to the registration counter. A friendly clerk smiles and asks to record your details. This will just take a moment.

pause_scene.title: Take a Breath
pause_scene.description: You take a moment to gather yourself. When you're ready, the clerk will be waiting.

enter_name.title: What is your name?
enter_name.description: Please enter the name you'd like to be known by.

ask_gender.title: A Few Details
ask_gender.description: The clerk notes your name and asks if you'd like to share your gender. This helps personalize records but is optional.

welcome_scene.title: Welcome Aboard
welcome_scene.description: The clerk smiles and finishes the paperwork. 'Welcome to the guild. Your journey begins now. Remember: be kind, be curious, and learn as you go.'

guild_explanation.title: How the Guild Works
guild_explanation.description: The clerk explains: 'The Adventurer's Guild matches people to tasks that suit their experience. As you gain experience you'll face tougher challenges.'

explain_rank.title: Ranks and Growth
explain_rank.description: 'New members begin as F-Rank. With time, practice, and successful tasks you may rise in rank. Higher rank brings greater responsibility and reward.'

hesitation_scene.title: A Moment of Doubt
hesitation_scene.description: The clerk offers reassurance: 'It's normal to be nervous. Start small, learn, and you'll grow more confident.'

training_grounds_info.title: Training Options
training_grounds_info.description: 'We offer practice areas and instructors where new members can learn basic skills. Take your time to prepare.'

receive_guild_badge.title: Your Registration
receive_guild_badge.description: The clerk completes the registration. 'You're officially registered. Keep your information safe and return if you need help.'

end.title: Registration Complete
end.description: You're now registered. When you're ready, speak to the clerk to continue your adventure.
